<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	Clause 2 Loan and Repayment
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Principal and Interest of Loan
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 14.45PT">
	(1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	currency of loan hereunder is USD, with the principal being USD 17 million ($17,000,000) and the yearly ratio of interest being
	10%. The calculation date of interest shall be the date when the Borrower receives the loan.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 14.45PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 14.45PT">
	(2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
	the Closing Date comes earlier than the Maturity Date, the Lender shall waive the interest specified in the above paragraph of
	this clause.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 14.45PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 14.45PT">
	(3)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
	the Borrower fails to repay the loan and the interest accrued hereunder upon the Maturity Date, the penalty of outstanding amount
	shall be calculated based on the yearly ratio of thirty percent (30%) as from the Maturity Date.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 14.45PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	2.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Usage of Loan
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	All amount of loan obtained by
	the Borrower subject hereto shall be used for the turnover of working capital of daily operation of the Borrower or its Affiliated
	Parties. Unless otherwise agreed by the Lender in writing in advance, the Borrower shall not use the same for any other purpose
	beyond the aforesaid usage.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	2.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Conditions Precedent for Loan Granting
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The Lender agrees to, within ten
	(10) working days upon achievement of conditions precedent for loan granting, remit in full the amount of loan hereunder to such
	payment account as specified by the Borrower. The loan granting conducted by the Lender shall be subject to the complete achievement
	of the following conditions (&ldquo;
<B>
	Conditions Precedent for Loan Granting
</B>
	&rdquo;):
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Execution, effectiveness and performance of this Agreement:
	(a) the Borrower and the Founding Shareholder have signed and delivered this Agreement according to law; (b) this Agreement is
	true, complete, effective and legally binding; (c) the Borrower and the Founding Shareholder have abided by and performed their
	obligation hereunder from all substantial aspects.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	As of the loan granting date, the representations and warranties
	in Clause 4 hereof made by the Borrower and the Founding Shareholder are true and effective.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Borrower has delivered to the Lender the payment notice
	which specified the Borrower&rsquo;s accurate bank account information.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The loan hereunder has been approved by the Lender and
	the Borrower&rsquo;s internal Board of Directors and other authorities.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(5)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	No material adverse change. As of the loan granting date,
	no material adverse change happens on the legal status, business operation and financial status of the Borrower and the Founding
	Shareholder.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(6)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	No significant judgment. As of the loan granting date,
	no court judgment, government decision or laws and regulations prescribes that (a) hinder or restrict any transaction hereunder;
	(b) hinder or restrict the completion of any transaction hereunder; (c) cause the Borrower, the Founding Shareholder and the Lender
	to suffer from significant punishment or assume legal liability due to the completion of any transaction hereunder; or (d) restrict
	the company&rsquo;s operation which can be result in the material adverse changes.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(7)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	No proceedings. As of the loan granting date, there is
	no proceedings, arbitration or administrative procedure and the verdict thereof, once being made, would exert an adverse impact
	on the Borrower and the Founding Shareholder, and such verdict would: (a) exert an adverse impact on the Borrower and the Founding
	Shareholder&rsquo;s performance of obligations hereunder; or (b) exert an adversely material impact on the transaction hereunder.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(8)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Execution and effectiveness of the Guarantee Agreement.
	Except for the Founding Shareholder&rsquo;s joint and several guarantee liability, the Borrower shall provide a guarantee for
	all loan principal, interest and all repayment obligations hereunder as acceptable to the Lender, and the guarantor execute an
	irrevocable and non-transferable Guarantee Agreement so as to assume joint and several guarantee liability for all loan principal,
	interest and all repayment obligations hereunder.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	2.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Loan Granting
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The Lender shall, within ten (10)
	working days upon achievement of the conditions precedent as specified in Clause 2.3 hereof, grant the loan hereunder in full to
	the following account specified by the Borrower:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Bank account specified by the Borrower:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Company Name: GALASSIA INTERNATIONAL
	HOLDING SHARES LIMITED
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Company Name in Chinese: &#38134;&#27827;&#22269;&#38469;&#25511;&#32929;&#32929;&#20221;&#26377;&#38480;&#20844;&#21496;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Bank Name: CHINA CONSTRUCTION BANK
	(ASIA) CORPORATION LIMITED
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Bank Account: 976 4871
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">

</P>

	The Borrower shall ensure the accuracy
	of the above account information, and shall be responsible for any losses incurred due to false account information provided on
	its own instead of the Lender.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	2.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Founding Shareholder&rsquo;s Joint and Several Guarantee Liability
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Borrower represents and warrants that it will repay
	all loan principal and interest accrued on the Maturity Date. Borrower A and B shall be deemed as co-borrowers and shall assume
	joint and several liability to the Lender for all loan principal, interest and all repayment obligations hereunder.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Parties agree that the Founding Shareholder shall assume
	joint and several liability for the Borrower&rsquo;s repayment of loan principal and interest hereunder, namely when the Borrower
	is obliged to repay the loan principal and interest subject to the terms and conditions hereof, the Lender is entitled to require
	either the Borrower or the Founding Shareholder to repay the same.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	Clause 3 Repayment
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	3.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Unless otherwise stipulated, the Borrower shall repay to the Lender all loan principal and interest
	accrued on the Maturity Date without delay, and repays the same to such bank account specified by the Lender in writing.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 7; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;

<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	7
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage233"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	3.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	If the Closing Date comes earlier than the Maturity Date, the Lender is entitled to transmit the loan
	principal hereunder into corresponding shares in the Equity Transaction. The completion of transmitting shares shall be deemed
	as paying off the loan, and the Lender shall waive the interest accrued hereunder. If the loan principal could not be transmitted
	into corresponding shares in the Equity Transaction for any reason, the Borrower shall repay such principal to the Lender and the
	Lender will further invest the same to the company.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	3.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	If the Lender at its sole discretion decides to waive the Equity Transaction; or the closing of the
	Equity Transaction fails to be completed for any other reason; or the parties agree on or laws and regulations cause the termination
	of this Agreement, the Lender is entitled to send out a repayment notice to the Borrower. Within three months upon delivery of
	such notice by the Lender, the Borrower shall pay off all loan principal and interest subject to the yearly ratio of 10%.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	Clause 4 Representations and Warranties
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	4.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Representations and Warranties
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 17.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Borrower and the Founding
	Shareholder jointly and separately make the following representations and warranties to the Lender:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21.25PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Legally incorporated, duly existing and qualified. The
	Borrower and its Affiliated Parties are legally incorporated, duly existing and fully qualified legal entities under the law of
	jurisdiction, with full right and authority to possess and operate their respective assets and conduct the business stated in
	the scope of business of their respective business license and Articles of Association.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Legally authorized. The Borrower and the Founding Shareholder
	have the right to execute, deliver and perform this Agreement. All necessary internal authorizations as regards the aforesaid
	issues have been obtained and will maintain effective. All representatives to sign on this Agreement and relevant legal documents
	have duly obtained the legal authorizations from the Borrower and the Founding Shareholder.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Abidance by laws and regulations. The Borrower and the
	Founding Shareholder shall promise to abide by all laws applicable to their business and operation from every aspect without violation
	of the same which will lead to adverse impact on their business or assets.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	No significant proceedings and arbitration. The Borrower,
	its Affiliated Parties and the Founding Shareholder have not directly or indirectly involved in any pending court proceedings,
	arbitration, claims, administrative procedure, judicial or administrative enforcement or other similar proceedings which exert
	material adverse impact on the performance hereof by the Borrower, its Affiliated Parties and the Founding Shareholder.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(5)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Legal effectiveness and enforceability. This Agreement,
	upon execution, will be legally binding and enforceable on the Borrower and the Founding Shareholder.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(6)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	No default. When the Borrower or the Founding Shareholder
	signs on or delivers this Agreement or perform their obligations under similar transaction documents, none of the following situation
	occurs:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.85IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.45IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Violation of or delay in performing any Articles of Association
	or other constitutional documents;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 99.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -35.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.85IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.45IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Causing to violate or delay in performing obligations under
	any contracts as a contractual party or such contracts are legally binding on the Borrower or the Founding Shareholder or their
	assets;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 99.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -35.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.85IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.45IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Violation of or failure to perform any legally binding
	laws and regulations, government orders or judgments.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 99.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -35.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(7)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Sound financial status. The Borrower, its Affiliated Parties
	and the Founding Shareholder have a sound financial status without being deteriorative or insolvent. Except for such liabilities
	as disclosed by the Borrower to the Lender in writing, the Borrower has not concealed any other direct, indirect, existing or
	contingent liabilities or similar assumption.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 9; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	9
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage235"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(8)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	No liquidation and bankruptcy. The Borrower, its Affiliated
	Parties and the Founding Shareholder are not involved in any dissolution, liquidation, bankruptcy, reconstruction, separation,
	consolidation, business suspense, rectification or similar legal proceedings, and there is no requirement or resolution causing
	the Borrower, its Affiliated Parties and the Founding Shareholder to be involved in the aforesaid proceedings.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(9)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	No material adverse change. There is no impact caused by
	adverse event or situation on the Borrower, its Affiliated Parties and the Founding Shareholder.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(10)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Sequence of creditor&rsquo;s right. The creditor&rsquo;s
	right of the Lender to the Borrower hereunder shall be at least in the same sequence as the creditor&rsquo;s right of the Borrower&rsquo;s
	other creditors without legal priority.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(11)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Exclusivity. From the execution date of this Agreement
	to (a) the closing date of the Equity Transaction; or (b) the date when the Lender at its sole discretion waives the Equity Transaction
	and the Borrower has paid off all loan principal and interest hereunder pursuant to the terms and conditions of this Agreement
	(&ldquo;
<B>
	Exclusivity Period
</B>
	&rdquo;), the Borrower, the Founding Shareholder and other shareholders, members of the Board
	of Directors and the Senior Management and Affiliated Parties, without the prior written consent of the Lender, shall not for
	the sake of the Borrower and its Affiliated Parties, directly or indirectly, seek for equity/ debt financing (exclusive of regular
	loan granted by commercial banks), or provide financing related information, or participate in relevant negotiation and discussion
	and agreement execution.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	4.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Liability for untruthful representations and warranties
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	If the Borrower and the Founding
	Shareholder have made any untruthful, inaccurate or insufficient representations and warranties hereunder which result in any damages,
	losses, expenses or other disadvantages suffered by the Lender, the Lender is entitled to require the Borrower and the Founding
	Shareholder to assume joint and several liability for compensation. Such compensation liability shall not impact any other rights
	and remedies enjoyed by the Lender subject to other clauses hereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 10; VALUE: 1 -->

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	Clause 5 Abidance by Restrictions
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The Borrower and the Founding Shareholder
	jointly and separately promise to the Lender that, before paying off the loan hereunder and without the Lender&rsquo;s prior written
	consent, the Borrower, its Affiliated Parties and the Founding Shareholder shall not:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Issue any securities or engage in any equity financing
	or assume any of such obligations;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Amend the Articles of Association or other important bylaws
	of the Borrower and its Affiliated Parties;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Engage in consolidation, merger, reconstruction or other
	transactions that will result in changes on power of control;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Directly or indirectly transfer, sell or dispose the Founding
	Shareholder&rsquo;s shares in the Borrower;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(5)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Transfer, sell and set encumbrance on or dispose significant
	assets of the Borrower or its Affiliated Parties (exclusive of the circumstance for the company&rsquo;s regular operation);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(6)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Increase or decrease the sear of the Board or change the
	controlling shareholder of the Borrower or its Affiliated Parties;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(7)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Dissolve or liquidate the company;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(8)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Declare or allocate any dividend to the shareholder;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(9)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Raise new loans from any third party or provide guarantee
	for any third party&rsquo;s debts;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(10)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Allow any third party to purchase shares or operational
	assets from the Borrower or its Affiliated Parties;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(11)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Conduct transactions by the Borrower with its employees,
	directors, shareholders or other Affiliated Parties;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(12)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Change any scope or plan of business.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	Clause 6 Confidentiality
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	6.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Confidentiality
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The Parties shall keep confidential
	all stipulations and clauses hereof, and all confidential information related to other Parties&rsquo; business and affairs acquired
	based on this transaction (&ldquo;
<B>
	Confidential Information
</B>
	&rdquo;). Unless for the purpose of this Agreement, any Party
	shall not take the liberty to use the Confidential Information or disclose the same to any third party. Notwithstanding the aforesaid,
	the Parties may, for the purpose hereof, disclose the Confidential Information to their employees, directors, management, consultants,
	agents or other involved individuals and/ or entities, provided that the disclosing Party shall take every reasonable measure to
	ensure such personnel are aware of the nature of the Confidentiality Information and cause such personnel to assume the aforesaid
	confidentiality obligation subject hereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	6.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Exemption from Confidentiality
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The confidentiality obligation
	specified in this Clause 6 is not applicable to:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Information which is well known by the public (except for
	such information as known by the public by breach of the confidentiality obligation specified hereof);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Information known by the receiving party via legitimate
	means before the disclosing party discloses the same;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Information independently developed by the receiving party
	via legitimate method (exclusive of such information as processed by means of integrating, analyzing, compiling the acquired information);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Information known or acquired by the receiving party from
	a third party exempting from the confidentiality obligation; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(5)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Information that the receiving party is allowed to disclose
	as consented by the disclosing party in writing.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Clause 7 Default and Liability
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	7.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	General terms
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Any failure to fulfill, insufficient
	fulfillment or failure to duly fulfill any obligations, or breach of any clauses of this Agreement by any Party (including without
	limitation any representations, warranties or promises made by such Party hereunder), regardless of act or omission, will constitute
	default (&ldquo;
<B>
	Default
</B>
	&rdquo;, the party which breaching the agreement is hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;
<B>
	Defaulting
	Party
</B>
	&rdquo;). The Defaulting Party shall make compensation to other Parties for all actual direct losses, damages, expenses
	or liability due to its default. If all Parties are in default, each Party shall assume respective liability and losses according
	to the actual situation. The Founding Shareholder agrees to assume joint and several liability for the Borrower&rsquo;s default
	hereunder.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	7.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Borrower&rsquo;s default event and liability
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any of the following events will constitute a default event
	of the Borrower:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Occurrence of any proceedings, arbitration or administrative
	procedures involved by the Borrower and its Affiliated Parties which, as reasonably considered by the Lender, will have an material
	adverse impact on the Borrower and its Affiliated Parties&rsquo; financial status and the capability of performing the obligations
	of the Borrower and its Affiliated Parties hereunder;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 99.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -35.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any representations or warranties made by the Borrower
	and the Founding Shareholder hereunder is proved to be untruthful, inaccurate or misleading;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 99.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -35.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Occurrence of default event specified in Clause 7.1 hereof;
	and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 99.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -35.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Borrower and the Founding Shareholder violate any other
	major obligations hereunder, or any other event occurs that will impact the Lender&rsquo;s major right hereunder.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 99.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -35.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In case of any default event of the Borrower listed in
	the above Clause 7.2 (1), the Lender is entitled to take all legally permissible actions, including without limitation all or
	part of the following actions:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">

</TD>

	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Early and immediate termination of the loan, requiring
	the Borrower to repay all outstanding amounts within ten (10) days, including without limitation the loan principal and interest
	hereunder; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 99.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -35.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Requiring the Borrower to make compensation to the Lender
	for all direct losses suffered by the Lender due to the default event.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 99.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -35.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	Clause 8 Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	8.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Governing law
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The execution, effectiveness, performance
	and interpretation of this Agreement shall be subject to the current laws and regulations of China.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	8.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Dispute resolution
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Any dispute shall be submitted
	to Beijing Arbitration Commission for arbitration in accordance with then effective arbitration rules in Beijing. The verdict of
	arbitration shall be final and legally binding on all Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	Clause 9 Supplementary Provisions
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	9.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Supplement and amendment to this Agreement
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1PT">
	Any supplement
	or amendment hereto will not come into effect unless agreed by the Parties in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	9.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Non-waiver
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 23PT">
	Unless clearly
	expressed in writing, any Party shall not be deemed as waiving any clause of this Agreement. Any Party&rsquo;s failure to require
	other Parties to strictly perform any clause or failure to exert any of its rights hereunder shall not be deemed as waiving any
	of the aforesaid clauses or waiver of exerting such rights henceforth.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 23PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	9.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Severability
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 35.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	If any of the clauses of this Agreement
	is illegal, invalid or unenforceable, or announced to be illegal, invalid or unenforceable by any arbitration court or court of
	jurisdiction:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Other clauses remain effective and enforceable; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.65IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Borrower and the Founding Shareholder shall not therefore
	negate the economic interests enjoyed by the Lender according to this Agreement and its Appendixes. The Parties agree to negotiate
	in good faith and adopt the reasonable suggestions proposed by the Lender, and accept to take other alternative solutions that
	have the same nature and effectiveness as permitted by law so as to grant the Lender the same or equal economic interests and
	legal rights, and thus realize the commercial purpose of this Agreement by all efforts.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 14.2PT">
</TD>

	9.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Notice
</TD>
</TR>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	If any Party sends a notice as
	regards any Party&rsquo;s rights or obligations by fax, the original hardcopy thereof should also be sent out by post. The contact
	information of each Party is as below:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 14.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21.3PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To the Borrower and/ or the Founding Shareholder:
</TD>

</TABLE>

	YU Ming

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
<B>
	SHAREHOLDER
	AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
<B>
	THIS SHAREHOLDER
	AGREEMENT
</B>
	(hereinafter referred to as &ldquo;this Agreement&rdquo;) is entered into on January 12, 2015 in Beijing among the
	following shareholders:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	1.
<B>
	Tianjin
	Mammoth Technologies Co., Ltd.
</B>
	(&quot;Party A&quot;), with its registered office at Room K2-5-403, Haitai Green Industrial
	Base, Huayuan Industrial Park, Tianjin
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	2. Bai Yanyan
	(&quot;Party B&quot;), ID Card no.: 110108198408023715.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	3. Chen Wei
	(&quot;Party C&quot;), ID Card no.: 110105197811120810.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	(collectively
	as &quot;Parties&quot; and each as &quot;Party&quot;.)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	The Parties
	hereby enter into the following agreements regarding joint investment in and establishment of a film company, as well as executing
	the Articles of Association of KongZhong Galaxy (Tianjin) Culture Media Co., Ltd. (&quot;
<B>
	Articles of Association
</B>
	&quot;)
	based on this Agreement:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
<B>
	ARTICLE 1
	PROFILE OF THE COMPANY
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	1.1 Name and
	Address of the Company
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	Company Name:
	KongZhong Galaxy (Tianjin) Culture Media Co., Ltd. (&quot;
<B>
	Company
</B>
	&quot;) (subject to the final registration with the administration
	for industry and commerce). Registered Office: Sino-Singapore Tianjin Eco-City
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	1.2 Type of
	Company and Limited Liability
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	The Company
	is a company of limited liability, and is liable for its debts limited by all its assets. Each Party is liable to the Company to
	the extent of his/her/its subscribed capital contribution.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
<B>
	ARTICLE 2
	PURPOSE AND BUSINESS SCOPE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	2.1 Purpose
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	The purpose
	of the Company is to make joint investment in production and distribution of films and TV plays, based on the principles of voluntariness,
	equality, cooperation and good faith, and by giving full play to the advantage of the Parties in their resources and experience.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	2.2 Business
	Scope
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	The business
	scope of the Company shall include (subject to the final registration with the administration for industry and commerce): production,
	reproduction and distribution of features, columns, variety shows, animations, radio plays and TV plays (the term indicated in
	the Radio and TV Program Production and Operation License shall prevail); general business operations: investment and management
	of films and TV plays, and lease of costumes and props for films and TV plays; lease of film and TV equipment; film and TV culture
	information consulting; corporate image planning; convention and exhibition services; ceremonial services; services of photographers
	and cameramen; design, production, agency and posting of various indoors and outdoors advertisements, film and TV advertisements;
	casting agency; software design and development; import and export; all other lawful business operations not required for review
	and approval.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	3
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->

	ARTICLE 3

</B>

	&nbsp;

	3.1 Registered
	Capital
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	The registered
	capital of the Company shall be RMB Fifty Million Yuan Net (RMB 50,000,000).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	3.2 Subscribed

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	3.3 Paid-in
	Capital
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	Each Party shall
	fully pay his/her/its subscribed capital contribution in accordance with the Company Law, the Company Registration Regulations
	and the provisions of this Agreement. After the Company is incorporated, the Company shall issue a Certificate of Capital Contribution
	to each Party.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 4; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	4
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage250"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	3.4 Representations
	and Warranties
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	Each Party hereby
	represents and warrants to other Parties that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	(1) Legal Status
	and Capacity. He/she/it has full and independent legal status and capacity to execute, deliver and perform this Agreement, and
	is able to independently participate in any legal action as a party. His/her/its execution of this Agreement and performance of
	obligations hereunder will not violate any applicable law, regulation or government order, or conflict with any contract or agreement
	to which he/she/it is a party or his/her/its assets are bound.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	(2) Lawful Investment.
	The source of the capital contribution to subscribe the shares of the Company hereunder is lawful, and he/she/it has sufficient
	capacity to pay the capital contribution to the Company in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	3.5 Articles
	of Association
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	When this Agreement
	is being executed, each Party shall also execute the Articles of Association of the Company according to the form of Appendix 1
	attached hereto. If any matter is not provided in the Articles of Association or any provisions thereof conflicts with any provisions
	of this Agreement, the provisions of this Agreement shall prevail.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
<B>
	ARTICLE 4
	SHARE TRANSFER AND RELATED MATTERS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	4.1 Share Transfer
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	Unless it is
	otherwise agreed herein, during the existence of the Company, without Party A's prior written consent, Party B and Party C shall
	not:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	(1) Set any
	pledge or any other encumbrance on his/her shares in the Company;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	(2) Sell, transfer
	or otherwise dispose of any of his/her shares in the Company or any interest therein to any third party; or
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	(3) Enter into
	any agreements or arrangement (including but not limited to voting trust or delegation) with any third party in respect of his/her
	voting shares in the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	4.2 Party A's
	Option
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	(1) Within three
	years after the Company is incorporated, Party A may exercise its option to purchase 16% shares of the Company held by Party B
	and Party C. If Party A decides to purchase 16% shares of the Company held by Party B and Party C, Party B and Party C shall transfer
	their 16% shares of the Company to Party A in proportion to their shares respectively, at the following price:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	Transfer price
	of 16% shares of the company = 7 times of the net profit of the Company in the previous year X 16%, where the net profit shall
	be amount determined in the tax filing form in Mainland China.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	The shares to
	be purchased by Party A through exercising its option are limited to 16%. If the shares to be purchased by Party A are less than
	16%, the transfer price shall be equal to 7 times of the net profit of the Company in the previous year multiplied by the actual
	proportion of shares to be purchased.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	If the Company
	issues any option, warrant, right to increase capital or any other rights convertible to the shares of the Company, Party A shall
	have the priority to subscribe such issued option, warrant, right to increase capital or any other rights convertible to the shares
	of the Company at its proportion of shares in the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 5; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	5
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage251"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0.1PT 0 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.1PT">
	(2) Cooperation
	and Assistance
</P>
